table_description: Contains data for the constructor's championship from 1958 to 2020, capturing championship standings from when it was introduced.

table_columns.name: position
table_columns.description: The finishing position of the constructor in the championship.

table_rules: When comparing teams across years, account for team name changes (e.g., Brawn GP became Mercedes).
Points systems have changed over the years, so direct points comparisons across eras may not be meaningful.
Constructor's Championship only started in 1958, so no data exists before that year.
